attributes.action: scrap and change the embarassing logo unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/other_sports/olympics_2012/6718243.stm

A new logo has been unveiled for the London 2012 Olympics. I feel it is an embarrassment and portrays our country in the worst possible way. 

The original London 2012 Logo was better by far. We need a new logo now, or at least a return to the old one!

I am happy that the olympics are coming to London and feel proud that we can showcase ourselves to the world but am deeply embarassed at £400,00 wasted on a dismal Olympic logo

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
